meanings.sent1: She misdials the phone number and reaches the wrong person.
meanings.sent2: He often misdials when he is in a hurry.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally misdials the emergency number while playing with the phone.
meanings.sent4: Her finger misdials the number as if it has a mind of its own.
meanings.sent5: The old phone always misdials, making it frustrating to use.

meanings.definition: To make an error in dialing a telephone number.
meanings.sent1: He misdials frequently due to his shaky hands.
meanings.sent2: She realizes she misdials when the call doesn't connect.
meanings.sent3: The robot maid misdials the pizza delivery number, ordering 100 pizzas by mistake.
meanings.sent4: His heart misdials the number, calling her instead of his best friend.
meanings.sent5: The tired mom misdials the school's number, reaching the zoo instead.
